title: Night Train to Nyk√∏bing
description: A woman hopelessly in love boards the night train to NykA, bing, Denmark, not knowing if the lover she leaves behind will ever be with her again. Then, through attempts to write her distant lover a letter she knows will never be sent, she recounts a long vigil, inspired by love, and her conspiracy with a waiting heart. Night Train to NykA, bing is a transformative tale that articulates the dense codes of love and the intensity of a life on the edge of abandonment. But this also is a story of return, finally to a heart that has wandered through the desert of time.
author: Kristjana Gunnars
